text: læa chāw yiw dị̂ kl̀āw ẁā xu sạyr pĕn butr k̄hx ngxạllxḥˌ læa chāw khris̄t̒ dị̂ kl̀āw ẁā xạl-ma sīh̄ˌ pĕn butr k̄hx ngxạllxḥˌ nạ̀n khụ̄x t̄ĥxykhả thī̀ phwk k̄heā kl̀āw k̄hụ̂n d̂wy pāk k̄hxng phwk k̄heā xeng sụ̀ng khl̂āy kạb t̄ĥxykhả k̄hxng brrdā p̄hū̂ thī̀ dị̂ pt̩is̄eṭh kār ṣ̄rạthṭhā mā k̀xn k̄hx xạllxḥˌ thrng laxˌnạt phwk k̄heā d̂wy t̄heid phwk k̄heā t̄hūk h̄ạnh̄e pị dị̂ xỳāngrị
